title.rendered: 400 Tie Points Solderless Self-Adhesive Breadboard – Nickel Plated breadboard – For DIY Projects

content.rendered:
A breadboard is an invaluable tool for experimenting with circuit designs whether in the R&D or university lab. This breadboards are made of ABS plastic which is completely reusable. This is solderless. This has a total of 400 tie points.

Solderless | White | Adhesive backing | Two mounting holes | Multiple units can be connected for larger projects | Reusable | ABS Plastic | Metal contact clips

Dimensions(LxWxH):82×55 x10 mm

Number of tie points:400 Soldering:Not required Mounting holes:2 How to stick?:Using self adhesive tape at back

Solderless Breadboard 400 Tie Points Self Adhesive PCB breadboard

excerpt.rendered: Solderless Breadboard: A breadboard is used to make up temporary circuits for testing or to try out an idea. This mini solderless breadboards have 3M double sided sticky tape on the back to mount them on to any circuit board of your choice. It comes with markings for easy circuit building and debugging. It can be used in a small working area for compact circuits. It can be used for prototyping, testing and creating add-on modules or new circuits. 400 tie-point 2 Power Lanes, Tie-point 100 1 Double-strip, Tie-point 300 SIZE: 8.2 5.5 0.85CM Specification:- 1.Perfect for Arduino Shield Prototyping and Testing; 2. Plastic housing, metal contact clips; 3.Accept wire with diameter 20-29AWG; 4. Voltage/ current: 300V/3-5A.
